resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107536</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107536</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206325</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Lewis and Clark Expedition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Lewis und Clark Expedition</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'expédition de Lewis et de Clark</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A expedição de Lewis e de Clark</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La spedizione del Clark e di Lewis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αποστολή Lewis και clark</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La expedición de Lewis y de Clark</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">presents 13 documents and photos related to the 1804-6 expedition into the newly acquired Louisiana Territory. The documents include a list of Indian presents Lewis purchased, his receipts for wine and tobacco, Jefferson's letter to Madison announcing the purchase of Louisiana, and Jefferson's message to Congress communicating the discoveries of the expedition.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschenke 13 Dokumente und Fotos standen auf der 
Expedition 1804-6 in die eben erworbene Louisiana Gegend in 
Verbindung. Die Dokumente schließen eine Liste der indischen 
Geschenke Lewis ein, das gekauft wird, seiner Empfänge für Wein und 
des Tabaks, Zeichen Jeffersons nach Madison, das den Erwerb Louisiana 
und Jeffersons der Meldung zum Kongreß verkündet, der die 
Entdeckungen der Expedition mitteilt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les présents 13 documents et photos ont associé 
à l'expédition 1804-6 dans le territoire nouvellement saisi de la 
Louisiane. Les documents incluent une liste de présents indiens
Lewis acheté, de ses réceptions pour le vin et de tabac, la lettre 
de Jefferson vers Madison annonçant l'achat du message de la 
Louisiane, et de Jefferson au congrès communiquant les découvertes 
en expédition.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">os presentes 13 originais e fotos relacionaram-se 
à expedição 1804-6 no território recentemente adquirido de 
Louisiana. Os originais incluem uma lista de presentes indian 
Lewis comprado, de seus recibos para o vinho e de tabaco, letra de 
Jefferson a Madison que anuncia a compra da mensagem de Louisiana, e 
de Jefferson ao congress que comunica as descobertas da expedição.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">i presenti 13 documenti e foto si sono riferiti 
alla spedizione 1804-6 nel territorio recentemente acquistato della 
Luisiana. I documenti includono una lista dei presenti indiani 
Lewis comprato, delle sue ricevute per vino e del tabacco, lettera del
Jefferson a Madison che annuncia l'acquisto del messaggio del 
Jefferson e della Luisiana al congresso che comunica le scoperte della
spedizione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσιάζει 13 έγγραφα και φωτογραφίες σχετικά με 
την αποστολή 1804-6 στο πρόσφατα επίκτητο έδαφος της 
Λουιζιάνας. Τα έγγραφα περιλαμβάνουν έναν κατάλογο Ινδού 
παρουσιάζουν Lewis που αγοράζονται, τις παραλαβές του για το 
κρασί και τον καπνό, την επιστολή Jefferson στο Μάντισον 
αναγγέλλοντας την αγορά της Λουιζιάνας, και το μήνυμα Jefferson
στο συνέδριο επικοινωνώντας τις ανακαλύψεις της αποστολής.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">los presentes 13 documentos y fotos se 
relacionaron con la expedición 1804-6 en el territorio nuevamente 
adquirido de Luisiana. Los documentos incluyen una lista de los 
presentes indios Lewis comprado, de sus recibos para el vino y del 
tabaco, carta de Jefferson a Madison que anuncia la compra del mensaje
de Luisiana, y de Jefferson al congreso que comunica los 
descubrimientos de la expedición.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206325</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107536</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-lewis-and-clark-expedition</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
